sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer

Class DrinkSelectionItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.DrinkSelectionItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrinkSelectionItem
extends java.awt.Panel
    This boundary object enables a drink to be displayed and selected. It also displays the stock availability of the drink.
    Version:
    1.0 2008-10-01
    Author:
    Team SE16T5E
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setItemState

        public void setItemState(boolean isOn)
        This method activates or deactivates the drink selection item button. This method also display "OUT OF STOCK" messages where appropriate.
        Parameters:
        isOn - TRUE to turn on the warning message and disable the button.

      • getItemState

        public boolean getItemState()
        This method returns the item state of the DrinkSelectionItem. This method determine whether the warning message is On or Off.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the warning message is On, otherwise, FALSE.

      • setState

        public void setState(boolean active)
        This method sets the state of the DrinkSelectionItem.
        Parameters:
        active - the active status of the DrinkSelectionItem; TRUE to activate it, FALSE to deactive it.

      • getState

        public boolean getState()
        This method returns the state of the DrinkSelectionItem.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the state is active, otherwise, FALSE.
